Posts.EditableText:
I'm looking for beta testers for my horror mystery squiffy game. Each playthrough should take at most 20 minutes, and there are three different storylines to follow. I'm interested in feedback on anything, narrative or technical. I'm interested in the visual aspects of the game as well since I use a screen reader and don't know how it looks. 


I'm entering it into the Spring Thing Festival, so I'd need feedback before the end of the month. You can contact me at neil(dot)butters (at) sympatico(dot)ca and I'll send you a link to the beta version.

Neil

Posts.EditableText: Is it too late now to beta test? Can we read the game anyway?
